directions: In a large pot, bring water to a boil. Add the tomatoes, carrots, onions and pork. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer for at least 2 hours. Add salt and bring to a boil for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.
ingredients: 2 pounds boneless pork loin, cut into 1 inch cubes
title: Pork Vegetable Soup
